helpTitle: portkey - project name -> port number (keyboard mapping)
optMap: -m, --map <object>   Custom mapping (JSON or JS-like object literal)
optDigits: -d, --digits <count> Preferred digit count for port (4 or 5, default: 4)
invalidDigits: Invalid digit count. Must be 4 or 5.
invalidLang: Unsupported language. Only "en" or "cn" are available.
noValidPort: No valid port could be generated from input.
